name: Amazon Echo Show 8
description: A voice-first smart display that enables video calls, reminders, and hands-free control — perfect for staying connected and safe.
target_audience_match: Ideal for families who want to maintain daily contact with elderly parents without overwhelming them with tech.

name: Wellness by Alarm.com
description: A non-intrusive monitoring system that uses motion sensors and AI to detect unusual activity patterns or falls — no cameras required.
target_audience_match: Great for caregivers who want 24/7 oversight without compromising privacy or independence.

name: Philips Lifeline with AutoAlert
description: A wearable emergency response system with fall detection, connecting seniors to help at the push of a button — even if they can't push.
target_audience_match: Essential for seniors living alone or at risk of falling, giving families peace of mind during daily routines.

name: MedMinder Smart Pill Dispenser
description: A locked, Wi-Fi-connected medication dispenser that lights up, beeps, and calls if pills aren’t taken — no smartphone needed.
target_audience_match: Perfect for managing complex medication routines without relying on tech-savvy behavior.

name: Wyze Cam v3 with Motion Detection
description: An affordable indoor/outdoor smart camera with two-way audio and motion alerts — great for remote monitoring without being intrusive.
target_audience_match: Affordable choice for adult children who want gentle visual reassurance while respecting independence.
